name: FInputChord
doc: An Input Chord is a key and the modifier keys that are to be held with it.

Key: The Key is the core of the chord.
bShift: Whether the shift key is part of the chord.
bCtrl: Whether the control key is part of the chord.
bAlt: Whether the alt key is part of the chord.
bCmd: Whether the command key is part of the chord.
